comments:
in i05250800

I was tried to sync some project on a repo to which I had not connected (using 
extssh) in this session.  When it asked me for the password I accidentally hit 
cancel.  Then I did it again and perhaps entered an invalid password.  When I 
go to sync again I always get a dialog saying "errors occured while trying to 
sync" with no additional info.  In the log I have the traces below.

<more of what appears to be the same ... >

More information...

I think I was actually entering the correct password.  I tried some completely 
bogus password and was prompted again for a new password. I am pretty sure that 
I don't have permissions to WRITE in that repo but am also pretty sure that I 
have (well at least had) permissions to read that repo as I already checked out 
the project using this very connection in this workspace.  I am just trying to 
catch up to any changes that may have occurred.

The log had information about permission denied.  Would be good if that could 
have surfaced in the UI rather than a generic "errors occured" message.

Note that the fix for bug 63887 also fixes the timeout problem of this bug 
(the symptoms differ but the root cause was the same). Leaving open to 
investigate the error message.
fix with the timeout thread cleanup.
